title: To all the sona supports below plat.
body: Standing behind the adc in lane, healing us while not poking the enemies, or saving your damaging abilities for next game is not efficent. Holding your R for 39 minutes into the game is also uncalled for. I know you're scared. You're squishy. You have to remember your champion deals damage from a distance. Out of all the supports in the game, I have the worst win rate with sona mains. It's hopeless. I'm going to dodge every sona player from here on out, I would recommend the same.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Road to Rank Won,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=p1m1XmAw,comment-id=,timestamp=2020-02-07T03:11:06.468+0000)
>

Sona has been a useless champ for years, I've literally been dodging games with Sonas ever since Patch 4.13 went Live.  Unfortunately, it's quite literally impossible for your Sonas to play any different than what you describe.  Her damage is crap, she dies to 2 autos early game & 1 auto at mid or later.  She **MUST** save ult for herself, because without that or Flash, she's an immobile pinata.

Unfortunately, she can't "harass from a distance," because almost all of her damage is 550-units.  Her passive is an auto-modifier, her Q's cast has a "champion priority" range equal to her basic attack range & her Q's shit-bubble is also an auto-modifier.  She quite literally **MUST** be in range of counter-harass to interact with the enemy.  Which like I said, means she will die if they're allowed to auto her just twice.

Before the recent "buff," she was the least-played support in the entire fucking game for very good reason.  Character is genuinely useless.  Playing Sona is like playing a fucking caster minion.  Furthermore, the NERF this patch was because 1 Youtuber played Sona.  Her pickrate beyond that lone player was still nigh-nonexistent.  Rito literally nerfed Sona because **ONE PLAYER** was "playing" Sona.  According to Meddler & Rito, Sona isn't allowed to have even 1 "dedicated" player.  That is the depth of Meddler's & Rito's hatred of Sona as a character.

To all players who criticize people on their team below rank 1:

Focus on your own play. There are things that you can do that will optimize your play regardless of what your teammates are doing. Wasting effort focusing on your teammates is just a recipe to get tilted.
If it's "hopeless" and you're "going to dodge every sona player from here on out," what's the point of this thread?
